title: Marilyn Lovell, stoic wife of Apollo 13 commander, dies at 93
description: During the four days following an on-board explosion, Mrs. Lovell showed steely resolve. Privately, she pondered life as a widow.

title: NYPD drones could be crashing your large Labor Day weekend parties
description: New York City says it will send drones to outdoor gatherings, including private residences, before it sends officers. Critics call the plan “downright creepy.”

title: There are almost no legal protections for the internet’s child stars
description: A growing movement is pushing for Congress to pass laws to protect child influencers similar to those that cover child actors.

title: Musk’s new Twitter policies helped spread Russian propaganda, EU says
description: A study commissioned by the European Commission found that “the reach and influence of Kremlin-backed accounts has grown further in the first half of 2023, driven in particular by the dismantling of Twitter’s safety standards.”

title: Texting do’s and don’t’s for 2023
description: The unspoken texting rules you should know from response time to group chat etiquette.

title: Arkansas law curbing kids’ social media access blocked for now
description: In issuing a preliminary injunction, U.S. District Court Judge Timothy Brooks expressed deep reservations about the state law’s constitutionality and efficacy.
